languages.text: {n}Что-то переменилось в Ульфаре, будто некий груз, с первой встречи давивший на плечи Волка, наконец исчез. В суровом его лице возникло спокойствие, которого прежде не было. Он почтительно кланяется вам.{/n} "Эттфатер, {mf|брат|сестра}, сердце поет, когда я вижу тебя. Клянусь, что {d|Encyclopedia:CompUlfar_Pack}имя твое не будет забыто{/d}, когда, возвратившись на Фенрис я буду петь свою сагу".

{n}Something has changed in Ulfar, as though a burden that has weighed on him ever since your first meeting is finally gone. There is a serenity in his harsh features that there never was before. He bows before you with respect.{/n} "Aett-Vater, it is good to see you. I swear that {d|Encyclopedia:CompUlfar_Pack}your name will not be forgotten{/d} when I return to Fenris and sing my saga."
languages.original_text: {n}Что-то переменилось в Ульфаре, будто некий груз, с первой встречи давивший на плечи Волка, наконец исчез. В суровом его лице возникло спокойствие, которого прежде не было. Он почтительно кланяется вам.{/n} "Эттфатер, {mf|брат|сестра}, сердце поет, когда я вижу тебя. Клянусь, что {d|Encyclopedia:CompUlfar_Pack}имя твое не будет забыто{/d}, когда, возвратившись на Фенрис я буду петь свою сагу".

traits.locale_text: {n}Something has changed in Ulfar, as though a burden that has weighed on him ever since your first meeting is finally gone. There is a serenity in his harsh features that there never was before. He bows before you with respect.{/n} "Aett-Vater, {mf|brother|sister}, my heart sings when I behold you. I swear that your name will not be forgotten when I return to Fenris and sing my saga."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Something has changed in Ulfar, as though a burden that has weighed on him ever since your first meeting is finally gone. There is a serenity in his harsh features that there never was before. He bows before you with respect.{/n} "Aett-Vater, {mf|brother|sister}, my heart sings when I behold you. I swear that your name will not be forgotten when I return to Fenris and sing my saga."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

There is a serenity in his harsh features that there never was before. He bows before you with respect.{/n} "Aett-Vater, {mf|brother|sister}, my heart sings when I behold you. I swear that your name will not be forgotten when I return to Fenris and sing my saga."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Something has changed in Ulfar, as though a burden that has weighed on him ever since your first meeting is finally gone. There is a serenity in his harsh features that there never was before. He bows before you with respect.{/n} "Aett-Vater, it is good to see you. I swear that {d|Encyclopedia:CompUlfar_Pack}your name will not be forgotten{/d} when I return to Fenris and sing my saga."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Algo ha cambiado en Ulfar. Es como si se hubiera deshecho de una carga que llevaba desde que os conocisteis. Sus severos rasgos muestran una serenidad que nunca habías visto en él. Te hace una respetuosa reverencia.{/n} «Aett-Vater, me alegro de verle. Juro que {d|Encyclopedia:CompUlfar_Pack}su nombre no caerá en el olvido{/d} cuando vuelva a Fenris a entonar mi saga».
languages.original_text: {n}Something has changed in Ulfar, as though a burden that has weighed on him ever since your first meeting is finally gone. There is a serenity in his harsh features that there never was before. He bows before you with respect.{/n} "Aett-Vater, it is good to see you. I swear that {d|Encyclopedia:CompUlfar_Pack}your name will not be forgotten{/d} when I return to Fenris and sing my saga."

traits.locale_text: {n}Algo ha cambiado en Ulfar. Es como si se hubiera deshecho de una carga que llevaba desde que os conocisteis. Sus severos rasgos muestran una serenidad que nunca habías visto en él. Te hace una respetuosa reverencia.{/n} «Aett-Vater, herman{mf|o mío|a mía}, mi corazón canta al verle. Juro que su nombre no caerá en el olvido cuando vuelva a Fenris a entonar mi saga».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}乌尔法身上发生了变化。从你们第一次见面以来一直压在他身上的重担，此刻似乎终于消失了。他严厉的五官中流露着前所未有的平和。他恭敬地向你鞠了一躬。{/n}“狼领，很高兴见到你。我发誓，当我回到芬里斯，吟唱我的史诗时，{d|Encyclopedia:CompUlfar_Pack}我绝不会忘记你的名字{/d}。”
languages.original_text: {n}Something has changed in Ulfar, as though a burden that has weighed on him ever since your first meeting is finally gone. There is a serenity in his harsh features that there never was before. He bows before you with respect.{/n} "Aett-Vater, it is good to see you. I swear that {d|Encyclopedia:CompUlfar_Pack}your name will not be forgotten{/d} when I return to Fenris and sing my saga."

traits.locale_text: {n}乌尔法身上发生了变化。从你们第一次见面以来一直压在他身上的重担，此刻似乎终于消失了。他严厉的五官中流露着前所未有的平和。他恭敬地向你鞠了一躬。{/n}“狼领，我的{mf|兄弟|姐妹}，当我看到你时，我的心在歌唱。我发誓，当我回到芬里斯，吟唱我的史诗时，我绝不会忘记你的名字。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}初めて会ったとき以来ずっと彼にのしかかっていた重荷がついになくなったかのように、ウルファーの中の何かが変わった。彼の厳しい表情には、これまでになかった静けさがある。彼はあなたに敬意を持ってお辞儀をする。{/n}「アエット＝ヴァテル、会えて嬉しいよ。俺がフェンリスに戻って俺のサーガを歌うときも、{d|Encyclopedia:CompUlfar_Pack}あんたの名前を忘れない{/d}と誓うよ」
languages.original_text: {n}Something has changed in Ulfar, as though a burden that has weighed on him ever since your first meeting is finally gone. There is a serenity in his harsh features that there never was before. He bows before you with respect.{/n} "Aett-Vater, it is good to see you. I swear that {d|Encyclopedia:CompUlfar_Pack}your name will not be forgotten{/d} when I return to Fenris and sing my saga."

traits.locale_text: {n}初めて会ったとき以来ずっと彼にのしかかっていた重荷がついになくなったかのように、ウルファーの中の何かが変わった。彼の厳しい表情には、これまでになかった静けさがある。彼はあなたに敬意を持ってお辞儀をする。{/n}「アエット＝ヴァテル、会えて嬉しいよ。俺がフェンリスに戻って俺のサーガを歌うときも、{d|Encyclopedia:CompUlfar_Pack}あんたの名前を忘れない{/d}と誓うよ」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar vous apparaît changé, comme s'il était enfin soulagé du fardeau qui l'accablait depuis votre toute première rencontre. Vous décelez dans ses traits sévères une sérénité que vous ne lui aviez encore jamais connue. Il s'incline devant vous avec respect.{/n} « Aett-vater, qu'il est bon de vous voir ! Je vous promets que je {d|Encyclopedia:CompUlfar_Pack}ne vous oublierai pas{/d} lorsque je rentrerai à Fenris et que je chanterai ma saga. »
languages.original_text: {n}Something has changed in Ulfar, as though a burden that has weighed on him ever since your first meeting is finally gone. There is a serenity in his harsh features that there never was before. He bows before you with respect.{/n} "Aett-Vater, it is good to see you. I swear that {d|Encyclopedia:CompUlfar_Pack}your name will not be forgotten{/d} when I return to Fenris and sing my saga."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar vous apparaît changé, comme s'il était enfin soulagé du fardeau qui l'accablait depuis votre toute première rencontre. Vous décelez dans ses traits sévères une sérénité que vous ne lui aviez encore jamais connue. Il s'incline devant vous avec respect.{/n} « Aett-vater, {mf|mon frère|ma sœur}, mon cœur chante à votre vue. Je vous promets que je ne vous oublierai pas lorsque je rentrerai à Fenris et que je chanterai ma saga. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}In Ulfar hat sich etwas verändert, als sei er endlich von einer Last befreit worden, die seit Eurer ersten Begegnung auf ihm gelegen hat. Seine rauen Züge strahlen eine Gelassenheit aus, die es vorher nicht gab. Er verneigt sich respektvoll vor dir.{/n} "Aett-Vater, es ist gut, Euch zu sehen. Ich schwöre, dass {d|Encyclopedia:CompUlfar_Pack}Euer Name nicht vergessen werden wird{/d}, wenn ich nach Fenris zurückkehre und meine Saga singe."
languages.original_text: {n}Something has changed in Ulfar, as though a burden that has weighed on him ever since your first meeting is finally gone. There is a serenity in his harsh features that there never was before. He bows before you with respect.{/n} "Aett-Vater, it is good to see you. I swear that {d|Encyclopedia:CompUlfar_Pack}your name will not be forgotten{/d} when I return to Fenris and sing my saga."

traits.locale_text: {n}In Ulfar hat sich etwas verändert, als sei er endlich von einer Last befreit worden, die seit Eurer ersten Begegnung auf ihm gelegen hat. Seine rauen Züge strahlen eine Gelassenheit aus, die es vorher nicht gab. Er verneigt sich respektvoll vor dir.{/n} "Aett-Vater, {mf|Bruder|Schwester}, mein Herz singt, wenn ich Euch erblicke. Ich schwöre, dass Euer Name nicht vergessen werden wird, wenn ich nach Fenris zurückkehre und meine Saga singe."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Something has changed in Ulfar, as though a burden that has weighed on him ever since your first meeting is finally gone. There is a serenity in his harsh features that there never was before. He bows before you with respect.{/n} "Aett-Vater, it is good to see you. I swear that your name will not be forgotten when I return to Fenris and sing my saga."

languages.text: {n}Ulfar'da bir değişiklik fark ediyorsun. Sanki ilk buluştuğunuzda taşıdığı o yükten kurtulmuş gibi. Sert simasında daha önce görmediğin bir sakinlik var. Önünde saygıyla eğiliyor.{/n} "Aett-Vater, seni görmek ne hoş. Yeminim olsun ki Fenris'e dönüp destanını anlattığımda {d|Encyclopedia:CompUlfar_Pack}ismin ölümsüz olacak{/d}."
languages.original_text: {n}Something has changed in Ulfar, as though a burden that has weighed on him ever since your first meeting is finally gone. There is a serenity in his harsh features that there never was before. He bows before you with respect.{/n} "Aett-Vater, it is good to see you. I swear that {d|Encyclopedia:CompUlfar_Pack}your name will not be forgotten{/d} when I return to Fenris and sing my saga."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar'da bir değişiklik fark ediyorsun. Sanki ilk buluştuğunuzda fark ettiğin o yük, omuzlarından kalkmış gibi. Sert simasında daha önce görmediğin bir sakinlik var. Önünde saygıyla eğiliyor.{/n} "Aett-Vater, seni görmek ne hoş. Yeminim olsun ki Fenris'e dönüp destanını anlattığımda ismin ölümsüz olacak."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
